ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates how to use custom tooltips with RolloverModifier, TooltipModifier, VerticalSliceModifier and CursorModifier.
ExampleDefinition.Description:
Demonstrates how to apply custom ControlTemplates and DataTemplates to various Tooltip modifiers within SciChart.
All the tooltip modifiers such as [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/webframe.html#RolloverModifier.html']RolloverModifier[/url], [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/webframe.html#TooltipModifier.html']TooltipModifier[/url], [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/webframe.html#VerticalSliceModifier.html']VerticalSliceModifier[/url] and [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/webframe.html#CursorModifier.html']CursorModifier[/url] have pre-defined DataTemplates set as attached properties on RenderableSeries.
These can be overridden if you wish to display a custom tooltip on the chart.
